title: Practical Management of Online Language Course Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational experience with online education platforms, experience in language education content development
context.additional_context: Practical training centered on applying a peer-review-based quality management process for corporate language education coordinators or in-house instructors

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three quality standards for online language courses by utilizing peer review processes.
Learners can derive at least five improvement points for educational programs by applying the QM (Quality Matters) standards framework.
Learners can establish and implement a quality management plan for actual corporate language training programs through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
